name: Westin Dhaka

reviews.text: I so very much look forward to breakfast at the Westin. Besides the wide assortment of food for every possible taste, I have been very impressed with the service of the various food stations and the attention of the wait staff. A gentlemen name Mizan has been especially attentive during my current stay and his smile and sincere desire to make my breakfast experience special is much appreciated. The Westin facilities and rooms are completely what I expect in this hotel franchise and although there is some competing hotel chains, the type of employees the hotel employs like Mizan will keep me coming back.
reviews.title: The Extra Attention at Breakfast Buffet

reviews.text: Good hotel given where it is; rooms are nice, room service was fast and the food excellent, breakfast buffet decent, internet was fast, there is a reasonable pool and gym. That said, it is not an *escape* from Dhaka - quite noisy from the traffic outside, the check-in and other processes (currency exchange) are slow, a/c a bit noisy. Probably still the best in Dhaka.
reviews.title: Good hotel, but you won't forget your in Dhaka!

reviews.text: First the hotel. Nice people, good location, comfy rooms, good food (they had a guest chef from Italy whilst I was there who was excellent) and a live band in the roof top bar (provided by the tone deaf school of the Philippines). I can promise you it does not get any better in Dhaka.
reviews.title: The most bizzare alcohol policy you will ever find

reviews.text: And I wont even complain about the astronomical cost of the wine because I know it is not their fault.
reviews.title: Once again back to the prefered location in Dhaka

reviews.text: But the rules about the serving of alcohol are nothig short of bizzare on the holly day. They won't serve you a bottle of wine in the lobby bar but they will serve you a glass of wine disguised as a cup of tea. Neither will they serve you a bottle of wine in the restaurant but if you order room service they will deliver it to your room (from the restaurant) and then you are free to BYO.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, nice service, nice staff...

reviews.text: good location, very clean tidy friendly hotel with all western amenities in the Indian continent, nice barbers shop, but be ready to pay western prices. couldn't really fault it for this part of the world . crazy traffic though. would i stay there again ? maybee if i got a better deal !! overpriced for what it is
reviews.title: Westin Dhaka

reviews.text: Stayed here for 9 days on a business trip. The staff are courteous. Breakfast is fruitful and tasty. Room is comfortable. The only set back is the road in front of the hotel is always crowded and dangerous..but guess just as everywhere in this hectic city. An authentic 5-star hotel, in a nutshell.
reviews.title: Cozy Room, Delicious Breakfast
Hugely overpriced for what you get
reviews.text: I was in Dhaka in late May 2013 for a week and our advice was that the Westin was the place to stay. It's a fine (as in OK) hotel. The rooms are posh, well appointed, clean, lots of marble in the bathroom (if you like that kind of thing) and it's well located in the middle of the city. The manager was friendly and ever present at breakfast and the check out staff were helpful. Given this, I wouldn't normally complain about a hotel as I'm about to... However, it costs me £170 a night to stay here, and for that price I think it's fair to expect pretty high standards. I've certainly had many, much better experiences, for significantly less money, in quality business hotels just across the border in India.
So here's what I found at the Westin, Dhaka, that I didn't think was particularly fair given the price:
reviews.title: Westin Hotel Dhaka, Venetian Las Vegas quality, Minus the slot machines,but add in crazy fun with the homeless children

reviews.text: - a lobby which (for the whole week I stayed) stank of diesel fumes
reviews.title: Perfect Business Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel offers good service and comfortable rooms. Though the price tag is a bit on the higher side as per Asian standards. There is an excellent bar at the terrace and the swimming pool is also nice.

reviews.text: Must confess to doing nothing more than sleeping here and going to a business event in the main event room. The bedroom was fine and the staff very friendly. The conference facilities were good too. The hotel has pleasant smart atmosphere
reviews.title: Quality Hotel

reviews.text: With the Radisson as the only internationally recognized hotel to contend with, the Westin Dhaka offers business travelers the convenience and so-so luxury in a developing city.
reviews.title: The Best Among The Rest

reviews.text: A short 30-minute car ride from the airport, the Westin is located approximately half way between the airport and downtown. The F&B facilities are probably the best of what the Westin Dhaka has to offer - Prego on the 25th floor serves good western meal; there is a 24-hour cafe on the ground floor that serves good burger and coffee; the breakfast spread at the 1st floor restaurant is also good.

description: Relax, revive, and experience renewal at The Westin Dhaka – the newly opened five-star hotel in Gulshan. Nestled in the new business district, we are steps from renowned shopping malls, foreign missions, restaurant, art, private clubs, and multinationals. Our hotel is also only eight kilometers from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport. Refreshing and contemporary, our 241 spacious guest rooms and suites offer modern amenities. Restore the body and expand the mind with the pure relaxation of our signature Heavenly Bed®. The oversized four-fixture bathroom with Heavenly Shower® ensures you feel refreshed. Every guest room offers a generous workspace and High Speed Internet Access. Five contemporary meeting venues offer over 2,000 square meters of functional space. This includes state-of-the-art meeting and banquet facilities featuring LED lighting for an extensive variety of lighting effects, customized projections, and a sound system in the Westin Grand Ballroom. Replenish in our bar or six restaurants. Revitalize in our temperature controlled poolside recreational area that offers spa facilities, steam room, sauna, and Jacuzzi. Our state-of-the-art fitness center offers endless possibilities for your wellness. The Westin Dhaka ensures you will leave our hotel rested, energized, enriched, and renewed.
